alert.note: Alert for Divide; Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 8:14PM CST until December 27 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Divide and Williams Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 AM Monday to Noon CST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
